title: Honeywell Forge
description: Developed components for Honeywell forge an enterprise performance management application to bring the sense for IoT data

title: Honeywell Site Onboarding Portal
description: Developed a unified solution for the Honeywell customer to onboard their sites which facilitate the various IoT devices residing on the site by proving the checklist to track the onboarding flow

title: Honeywell Extensible Object Model
description: Majorly contributed to the development of the EOM-PaaS APIs using a modern backend stack. which provides the managed infrastructure to serve all the major IoT requirements. And also automated the creation of Kafka topic, consumers, and producers which certainly reduces the overhead to the Digi-ops team

title: KeyP - Password Manager Application
description: Design and developed the simplest solution to keep your passwords/pin only with you without accessing the internet

title: Walfin - an app to track all expenses
description: Designed and developed daily expenses tracker mobile app which provides a chat-based interface to add, manage and track all of your expenses

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A simple lightweight personal portfolio and technology guide which contains various topics such as Javascript, CSS, and React
